title: California AI Transparency Act
summary: Requires developers of large-scale AI systems to provide transparency about training data and model capabilities before deployment. Mandates public disclosure of AI-generated content.

title: Safe and Secure Innovation for Frontier Artificial Intelligence Models Act
summary: Establishes safety standards for large AI models, requiring safety testing and reporting for models above certain computational thresholds. Creates CalCompute public cloud infrastructure.

title: Safe AI Innovation Act
summary: Requires developers of large AI models to implement safety protocols and whistleblower protections. Vetoed by Governor Newsom in September 2024.

title: AI Training Data Transparency
summary: Requires generative AI providers to disclose the sources of training data used in their models. Aims to increase transparency in AI development.

title: Automated Decision Tools
summary: Regulates the use of automated decision-making tools in employment, housing, and healthcare. Requires impact assessments and human oversight.
